import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card, Form, Badge } from "react-bootstrap"; import Navbar from "../components/Navbar"; // 1. DỮ LIỆU GIẢ (Đồng bộ với trang Home) const mockProducts = [ { id: 1, title: "MacBook Pro M3 Max", brand: "Apple", category: "Laptop", price: 45000000, originalPrice: 48000000, discount: 15, rating: 5.0, reviews: 85, description: "The most powerful MacBook Pro ever is here. With the blazing-fast M3 Max chip, get incredible performance and amazing battery life. Featuring a stunning Liquid Retina XDR display and all the ports you need.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517336714731-489689fd1ca4?q=80&w=1000&auto=format&fit=crop" }, { id: 2, title: "Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra", brand: "Samsung", category: "Smartphone", price: 32000000, originalPrice: 35000000, discount: 10, rating: 4.8, reviews: 120, description: "Unleash your creativity, productivity, and possibilities with the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra. featuring AI integration, a 200MP camera system, and the powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 for Galaxy.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1610945415295-d9bbf067e59c?q=80&w=1000&auto=format&fit=crop" }, { id: 3, title: "Sony WH-1000XM5", brand: "Sony", category: "Audio", price: 8500000, originalPrice: 9500000, discount: 12, rating: 4.7, reviews: 45, description: "Sony's best noise cancelling headphones yet. With two processors controlling eight microphones, Auto NC Optimizer for automatically optimizing noise cancelling based on your wearing conditions and environment.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1618366712010-f4ae9c647dcb?q=80&w=1000&auto=format&fit=crop" }, { id: 4, title: "iPad Pro 12.9 M2", brand: "Apple", category: "Tablet", price: 28000000, originalPrice: 30000000, discount: 8, rating: 4.9, reviews: 60, description: "iPad Pro. With astonishing performance, superfast wireless connectivity, and next-generation Apple Pencil experience. Plus, powerful new productivity and collaboration features in iPadOS.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1544244015-0df4b3ffc6b0?q=80&w=1000&auto=format&fit=crop" }, ]; function ProductDetail() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { id } = useParams(); // Đổi tên state từ 'book' sang 'product' const [product, setProduct] = useState(null); const [feedbacks, setFeedbacks] = useState([]); // Form states const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [rate, setRate] = useState(5); const [comment, setComment] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { const foundProduct = mockProducts.find((p) => p.id === parseInt(id)); if (foundProduct) { setProduct(foundProduct); } else { setProduct(null); } setFeedbacks([]); }, [id]); const handleSubmitFeedback = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const newFeedback = { id: Date.now(), userName: name || "Tech Enthusiast", // Tên mặc định ngầu hơn rate: parseInt(rate), comment: comment, createdAt: new Date() }; setFeedbacks([newFeedback, ...feedbacks]); setComment(""); setName(""); setRate(5); }; if (!product) { return ( <>

Product not found!

 ); } return (
{/* PRODUCT INFO SECTION */}
{/* Cột Trái: Ảnh Sản phẩm */}
{/* Cột Phải: Thông tin chi tiết */}
{product.category}

{product.title}

Brand: {product.brand}
{/* Rating */}
{"★".repeat(Math.round(product.rating))} {"☆".repeat(5 - Math.round(product.rating))} ({product.reviews} verified reviews)
{/* Giá tiền */}
{product.originalPrice && (
{product.originalPrice.toLocaleString()} VND {product.discount && ( -{product.discount}% OFF )}
)}

{product.price.toLocaleString()} VND

{product.description}

{/* Specs giả lập */}
  • Official Warranty (12 months)
  • Free Shipping Nationwide
  • 7 Days Return Policy
{/* FEEDBACK SECTION */}

Customer Reviews

Write a Review
Name (Optional) setName(e.target.value)} /> Rating setRate(e.target.value)}> Review setComment(e.target.value)} required />
{feedbacks.length === 0 ? (

No reviews yet. Be the first to review this product!

) : ( feedbacks.map((fb) => (
{fb.userName}
{fb.createdAt.toLocaleString()}
{"★".repeat(fb.rate)} {"☆".repeat(5 - fb.rate)}

{fb.comment}

 )) )} {/* Cột Sidebar gợi ý (Optional) */}

); } export default ProductDetail;
